author: Staff Reporter
text:
The victorious volleyball team of Panimalar Engineering College, Chennai, receiving the trophy from A. Murugesan, Superintendent of Prisons, Central Prison, Tiruchi.

Panimalar Engineering College, Chennai, won the volleyball title in The Centenary Tournaments of the St.Joseph’s College here recently.

The three-day event was played on a knockout-cum-league basis. At the end of the knockout phase, Panimalar Engineering College, Jamal Mohamed College, SRM University, and Loyola College qualified for the semi-final league.

Panimalar Engineering College won all its three matches in the semifinal league and clinched the top spot. Jamal Mohamed College, with two wins, finished runner-up. SRM University, with one win, bagged the third spot.

A. Murugesan, Superintendent of Prisons, Central Prison, Tiruchi, gave away the prizes in the presence of T. Pichaiappa, secretary, Tiruchi District Volleyball Association, K.A. Jayakumar, Controller of Examinations, St. Joseph’s College, S. Aruldoss, sports coordinator, and A. Prem Edwin, Director of Physical Education.
title: Panimalar Engineering College lifts volleyball title
